body.name: Spin Mop and Bucket Set,Mop and Bucket with Wringer Set for Home Cleaning Microfiber Mop with 3 Washable and Reusable Microfiber Pads, Dry and Wet Mop for Hardwood Wood Tile Green 1PCS
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 7 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 27 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 💝【Spin Mop with Foldable Head】Unique design allows the mop head to be folded so that it can effectively clean corners and crevices, underneath furniture, next to baseboards and between tiles. The mop is easy to assemble, convenient to use, and uniquely shaped to make cleaning easy and enjoyable.

💝【Comfortable Long Handle】The spin and adjustable cleaning mop is made of three high-quality stainless steel poles. The hitch on the handle allows for a telescoping effect that extends up to 46.25 inches, allowing you to reach wherever you want to clean and never have to bend down to work again.

💝【Spinning Mop and Bucket with Dirt Separation System】 Mop and Bucket Spinning Device with Scraper Strip 360° for Powerful Removal of Hair and Dirt By pressing down on the mop, it not only separates the fresh water from the dirty water, but also achieves a thorough cleaning. You can easily get a clean and slightly wet mop for quick cleaning.

💝【Microfiber Mop Pads】Microfiber mops are absorbent. We provide deep cleaning solutions for your home and floor cleaning, effectively removing dirt, dust and moisture! Sitable for RVs, small apartments and small studios.
💝【Warm Tips】:Our product is brand new, if you have any questions about the product, please feel free to let us know. Your satisfaction is our ultimate goal.
body.description: 1.Mop and bucket set as a good helper for your floor cleaning, is easy to clean floor dust, tile stains, take away the hair on the floor, great for families with pets. 2.Pick up dust and pet hair really well-super easy to spin clean and continue mopping floors. No drips—mop is just the perfect dampness to clean adequately.

productInformation.value: #64,279 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #27 in Household Mops & Bucket Sets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have 3 large dogs and it’s currently mud season in MI I love this Mop, makes my life way easier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Horrible and a waste of my money! Directions are not clear, had to figure it out on my own. VERY cheaply made, parts come off every time you take the mop out. Barely gets the mop wet so you have to re pump it MANY TIMES! Overall horrible product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Middle piece keeps popping off
reviews.reviewText: The middle piece pops off no matter which direction the latch is. I have spinal issues and I was in more pain using this mop because of that than I was with my mop that you use the handle to wring out. Also it doesn't get wet enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They did send me a dirty pad but I was going to get them dirty anyway so I used that one first. It took me a second to get the hang of it but after completing my first full tile room I was impressed with my purchase. Decided to keep and not return afterall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It was good while it last.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to try and it was good until my husband used it and the pole snapped in half, the poles are not that strong, while I was cleaning the floor it did feel like it was going to break at any minute and it broke within seconds of my heavy handed husband using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It took a little while for me to figure it out. But my grandson loves helping me and he loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Like but broke first day
reviews.reviewText: If it had not broke I would have gave this item 5 stars….I like the concept of this mop but the quality of the mop handle is very poor it broke the first time using it and my husband had to put screws in it. It is easy to use and easy to setup. Great for cleaning walls and floors. I love the way the dirty water separates from the clean water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the mop but every time I spin it, the piece on the base comes off and I have to take it off to mop the floor! If this piece would stay on like it’s supposed to, it’d be perfect.
